text: Aeson is a figure in Greek mythology. Aeson or Aison (ancient Greek: Αἰσών or Αἴσων) may also refer to: *Aeson (Thessaly), a town in ancient Thessaly *Aeson (Thrace), a town in ancient Thrace *Aesion, an Athenian orator *Aison (vase painter), the red-figure painter
title: Aeson (disambiguation)
